plot: An artificially intelligent weather machine eschews its master's control to go on wanton courses of destruction in Chicago.

Ben chafes openly against having to pursue an interest of Grandpa Max for a change (that of seeing his favorite, past-its-prime rock band, Shag Carpeting, at a Chicago music festival). Meanwhile, an embittered local weatherman has problems when his defiant, artificially intelligent robotic weather machine decides it should be all that it can be, creating the most destructive weather possible.—statmanjeff
